news.title: MG Academy
news.description: MG Academy provides you with access to bespoke specialist business content. Providing webinars, seminars, articles, and tailor-made presentations. Our sessions will allow for you to upskill and get insights into different business sectors. Some MG Academy courses will also count towards earning CPD points for accountants and lawyers.
news.incubatorProgramDescription:
Our Incubator Program is for early-stage companies where we help founders find their optimal product-market fit and scale their ventures. Where we unlock access to our know how, and a panel of professionals for expert advice and mentorship.

We understand that cash-flow can be tight for start-ups, so companies that fit the application criteria will get access to our expertise and our global network of professionals so that they can seek funding and successfully grow fast.
news.incubatorProgramFormCode: Fill out my online form.

nodes.title: Help us raise funds for Tour de Cure!
nodes.excerpt: Join us for an afternoon amongst snowflakes to raise funds for Tour de Cure. On the 10 – 19 March our team rode and travelled from Geelong to Canberra to raise awareness for cancer research with Tour de Cure.
nodes.content:
Join us for an afternoon amongst snowflakes to raise funds for Tour de Cure. On the 10 – 19 March our team rode and travelled from Geelong to Canberra to raise awareness for cancer research with Tour de Cure.

Join us as we celebrate this amazing achievement, and help raise much needed funds for cancer research. Enjoy and experience a winter wonderland of, great food and wine, and amazing auction items such as Ash Barty’s signed tennis racquet.

nodes.title: Remote Workforce: Discover the impacts, challenges and opportunities for 2022
nodes.excerpt: As we experience yet another year of uncertainty, we’ve tailored a panel of experts to uncover the impacts, challenges and opportunities of the workforce trends for 2022. Together with MG Academy’s Domenic Calabretta, CEO of Mackay Goodwin, we have cyber security expert Ben Jones, Managing Director of Continuum Cyber and workforce management specialist Peter Oreb, CEO of CXC Global.
nodes.content: As we experience yet another year of uncertainty, we’ve tailored a panel of experts to uncover the impacts, challenges and opportunities of the workforce trends for 2022. Together with MG Academy’s Domenic Calabretta, CEO of Mackay Goodwin, we have cyber security expert Ben Jones, Managing Director of Continuum Cyber and workforce management specialist Peter Oreb, CEO of CXC Global.

nodes.title: Real Estate Negotiations in the Covid Environment with Knight Frank
nodes.excerpt: Join James Johnston, Director, Knight Frank, David Creais, Partner of Bartier Perry Lawyers, and Domenic Calabretta, CEO, Mackay Goodwin on discussing the current issues the real estate industry is facing including negotiating leases due to the current COVID environment.
nodes.content: Join James Johnston, Director, Knight Frank, David Creais, Partner of Bartier Perry Lawyers, and Domenic Calabretta, CEO, Mackay Goodwin on discussing the current issues the real estate industry is facing including negotiating leases due to the current COVID environment.

nodes.title: Exploring Your Clients Options With Tax Negotiations in the Current Covid Environment With Tax Assure
nodes.excerpt: Join Olga Koskie, Principal, Tax Assure, David Hill, COO, Mackay Goodwin and Mitchell Ball, Director, Mackay Goodwin to explore your clients options in the current environment.
nodes.content: Join Olga Koskie, Principal, Tax Assure, David Hill, COO, Mackay Goodwin and Mitchell Ball, Director, Mackay Goodwin to explore your clients options in the current environment.

nodes.title: Digital Transformation AI & Robotics for Finance & Accounting with Professor Aditya and David Pugh
nodes.excerpt: Join David Pugh, MD, Aquiliti, Professor Aditya Ghose, School of Computing and Information Technology, University of Wollongong and Domenic Calabretta, CEO, Mackay Goodwin to discuss the digital transformation of AI and robotics.
nodes.content: Join David Pugh, MD, Aquiliti, Professor Aditya Ghose, School of Computing and Information Technology, University of Wollongong and Domenic Calabretta, CEO, Mackay Goodwin to discuss the digital transformation of AI and robotics.

nodes.title: Examining the Current Economy with Macquarie Bank
nodes.excerpt: Join Martin Lakos, Division Director Macquarie Wealth Management, Andrew Knowles, National Segment Head – Insolvency, Business Banking, Macquarie Bank and Domenic Calabretta, CEO, Mackay Goodwin to discuss the outlook of the Australian economy.
nodes.content:
Join Martin Lakos, Division Director Macquarie Wealth Management, Andrew Knowles, National Segment Head – Insolvency, Business Banking, Macquarie Bank and Domenic Calabretta, CEO, Mackay Goodwin to discuss the outlook of the Australian economy.

                         We will:      

  • Look at a global big picture view
  • Drilling down to our outlook in Australia
  • Looking into interest rates, business and consumer confidence
  • Business investment and property
  • What macro themes we believe will play out this decade

nodes.title: Cyber Crime with James Linton
nodes.excerpt:
Join James Linton, Ben Jones, Managing Director of Continuum Cyber and Domenic Calabretta, CEO of Mackay Goodwin as they discuss:

Importance of cyber education
Why Cyber security is necessary
A CEO’s experience with Cyber Crime

Attendees will receive the opportunity for a free cyber health check and access to a free eBook on how to secure your business.
nodes.content:
We are excited to launch Mackay Goodwin’s MG Academy, kicking off with our first webinar on Cyber Crime featuring the notorious James Linton aka email prankster. Following his spear phishing bonanzas of the White House and Bank of England, now James has partnered with MG Academy and Continuum Cyber to create awareness to companies and help employees make better security decisions. Lawyers and accountants are ultimately sitting ducks and the most sought after targets when it comes to Cyber Security. Our webinar will provide the importance of education and why it can save 95% of all attacks.

Join James Linton, Ben Jones, Managing Director of Continuum Cyber and Domenic Calabretta, CEO of Mackay Goodwin as they discuss:

Importance of cyber education
Why Cyber security is necessary
A CEO’s experience with Cyber Crime

Attendees will receive the opportunity for a free cyber health check and access to a free eBook on how to secure your business.
